text:
While developers in AWS Analytics services
can access Redshift data for advanced, complex

analytics and machine learning use cases,
curating Redshift data can be cumbersome
with third-party or open-source data connectors.

Amazon Redshift Integration for Apache Spark
makes it easy to access enriched data
in Amazon Redshift through Apache Spark applications.
Get meaningful insights faster in AWS analytic services
with this AWS-certified connector.

Developers using Amazon EMR, AWS Glue 
and Amazon SageMaker
can quickly build Apache Spark applications

that read from and write to their 
Amazon Redshift data warehouse

without compromising the performance
of applications
or the transactional consistency of the data.

Amazon Redshift Integration for Apache Spark
also makes your application secure
by leveraging IAM-based credentials.

With Amazon Redshift
Integration for Apache Spark,

there is no manual setup and maintenance of
uncertified versions of Spark-Redshift
open-source connectors.

You can easily get started with Amazon Redshift
data and run Apache Spark apps.

Amazon Redshift Integration for Apache Spark
is easy to use and optimized for performance.

Shorten your time to analytics and machine
learning, without any compromises.

Get started with Amazon Redshift Integration
for Apache Spark today.
